alert.note: Alert for Baylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 05 at 11:17PM CDT until September 06 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Baylor County in northern Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1117 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Seymour, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Seymour, Westover, and Mabelle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
